teacheasy.certificate

Class CertificateWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.certificate.CertificateWindow

  • public class CertificateWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a certificate for a completed lesson. Information is pulled from the document info and inserted into an HTML certificate template which is then made visible. A button is provided to print the certificate.
    Version:
    1.0 27 May 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CertificateWindow.PrintButtonHandler
      Handles presses on the print button by taking a snapshot of the screen and printing it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CertificateWindow

        public CertificateWindow(Lesson nLesson,
                 int nMarks)
        Constructor method. Creates the certificate window, filling in the necessary information.
        Parameters:
        nLesson - The lesson the certificate is for.
        nMarks - The number of marks the student gained during the lesson.
